name: Escape The Night (Darko Markan)
description:
Escape The Night is the first instalment of the horror game series created by Darko Markan.
The game is about unknown character who woke up in a bedroom not knowing where he is.
He's trying to escape the house and he's been chased by The Witch.
The night seems to never end, will he succeed? Can he escape the night?
Find out and enjoy this horror game
